title: nIvE dikkani
sahitya:
nIvE dikkani nEnentO ner nammitinayya


anupallavi

  shrI veleyu shESagiri nivAsA cintitha phaladAyaka shrInivAsA


caraNam    sancita karmamulanu drnceTi divamani vancu bAgugAnu yOcinci hrdayamuna ninnunci 
sumamula pUjinci sadA ninnu dhyAninci nanu karuNinci rakSintu vanucu ancitamuga nI padamula 
sEvincu mati ninnE golicitinA panca bhUta sAkSi gAnu shrI gOpAladAsa vinuta bhavya dAyaka
